nodes.text: Jerren Durs was a male Human who operated a leisure ranch on the planet Froswythe. Around the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War, a group of individuals stayed at Durs' ranch while on a vacation and early one morning, Durs and his guests rode out on ycaqts to round up a herd of banthas. However, while they were herding the banthas, a plains panther spooked the creatures and caused them to stampede.
